title: iPhone 17 resale numbers are high just a few months after launch — Here's why Americans are selling the Apple smartphone
snippet: Apple's flagship iPhone 17 Pro Max logged 11.5% of the top 20 trade-ins in the United States, months after its launch. A study found that owners are capitalising on strong market prices with early resale of the device.

title: ChatGPT crosses 100 million weekly users in India; 18–24-year-olds send half the messages: OpenAI
snippet: OpenAI has revealed that 50% of ChatGPT messages in India come from users aged 18-24. The country has surpassed 100 million weekly active users, with 35% using the tool for work tasks, the data reveals

title: Are DeepSeek Moments Now the New Normal?
snippet: A little-known Chinese AI company recently released an open-source reasoning model that challenged Western dominance and was developed at a fraction of the cost. And no, it’s not DeepSeek.

title: iPhone 17 available for  ₹44,768 during Croma Everything Apple Sale: here's how the deal works
snippet: Apple's iPhone 17 is now available for under  ₹50,000 during Croma's Everything Apple Sale, with discounts through trade-ins and bonuses. The phone was launched by Apple during its flagship launch event in September last year.

snippet: Indian AI startup Sarvam.AI has launched Indus, a new chat interface. This chatbot is built on Sarvam's own 105 billion sovereign model. title: India-made robots shine at AI Impact Summit 2026 after early controversy
snippet: Indian-made robots captured attention at the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi. The SVAN-M2 robot dog from xTerra Robotics impressed attendees. title: Germany's ruling party backs social media curbs for children
snippet: Germany's ruling conservatives have proposed banning social media for children under 14. Stricter digital checks for teenagers are also planned. Fines for platforms failing to enforce these limits are being considered. This move follows similar discussions in other European nations. The proposed ban

title: India calls for democratic diffusion of AI at New Delhi summit
snippet: India has released the AI Impact Summit Declaration, a voluntary global framework for AI cooperation inspired by "welfare for all." The declaration, endorsed by multiple nations, outlines seven pillars for collaboration, including human capital development, trustworthy AI, and democratising AI resou

title: Andhra inks seven agreements at AI Summit focusing on education, skilling
snippet: The Andhra Pradesh government has signed seven agreements at the AI Impact Summit in New Delhi, with most of them directed towards higher education, advanced skilling and school transformation.

title: Microsoft launches AI skilling programme for 2 million Indian teachers, 200,000 institutions by 2030
snippet: Microsoft has announced the launch of Microsoft Elevate for Educators in India, an initiative designed to skill two million teachers and reach 200,000 schools and educational institutions by 2030, as part of Microsoft's broader commitment to equip 20 million people in India with AI skills.

title: EV charging startup Statiq secures $18 million from Tenacity Ventures, others
snippet: Electric vehicle (EV) charging startup Statiq has secured $18 million in fresh funding led by Tenacity Ventures. Existing backers Y Combinator, Shell Ventures, and RCD Holdings also participated in the round, which comprised a mix of equity and debt, the company said.

title: Measles cases are rising. Other vaccine-preventable infections could be next.
